title: Small firms want govt to prioritise forex solutions
description: Small Scale Business Importers and Exporters Association has appealed to the new administration to prioritise addressing foreign exchange scarcity, describing it as the backbone of the country’s economic challenges. The association’s secretary general Frank Mhango said this in Lilongwe on Friday at a time foreign exchange reserves continue to decline and are now recorded at ...The post Small firms want govt to prioritise forex solutions appeared first on Nation Online.

title: Trump administration says SNAP will return after court order
description: Food needs are still growing — area food banks are helping bridge the gap

title: Joseph (Joe) Milazzo
description: Joseph (“Joe”) Salvatore Milazzo passed away on October 23, 2025, one day after his 91st birthday, surrounded in love by his daughters. Born in Pittston, Pennsylvania, Joe spent the last 46 years of his life in Anaheim, California — a place he grew to love and call home. Joe was devoted to his family. He [...]

title: Patrick M Mehtonen
description: Patrick M Mehtonen peacefully passed away October 28, 2025 in Ukiah. He was born on November 25, 1955. Pat is survived by friends and hunting buddies who have been enriched by his life and love for his ranch. He was preceded in death by his sister, Marsha; mother, Wanda Burke Mehtonen and father, Marcus Mehtonen. [...]

title: Azerbaijan discloses amount of accounting discrepancy in summary budget for 2026
description: A discrepancy of 299.1 million manat ($174.5 million) has been found in Azerbaijan's 2026 budget.

title: Daniel Thomas Young
description: Daniel “Dan” Thomas Young, age 81, of Fayetteville, TN, formerly of Paradise, CA, passed away on October 31, 2025, at Huntsville Hospital in Huntsville, AL. Born on January 6, 1944, in Cleveland, OH, Dan was the son of the late Lawrence Frederic Young and Mary Eleanor Yanak Young. A man dedicated to service, he proudly [...]

title: Celeste A. Pearce
description: Celeste Ann Magill was born in New Jersey on March 20, 1933, to Joseph and Mary Elizabeth Bruce Magill. Her father, Joseph, was born in Scotland on February 11, 1896, and her mother, Mary, was born in Scotland in 1905. Celeste married Donovan Eugene Pearce in May 1960. They had two children: David Carr, born [...]

title: Leo Wealth LLC Has $27.45 Million Stock Position in Apple Inc. $AAPL
description: Leo Wealth LLC increased its holdings in shares of Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL – Free Report) by 93.5% during the 2nd quarter, according to the company in its most recent filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The firm owned 133,850 shares of the iPhone maker’s stock after buying an additional 64,681 shares during the [...]

title: Barbara Colleen Greppi
description: Barbara Colleen Greppi Known for her beautiful smile and kindness , Barbara Greppi passed away on October 28, 2025 at age 96. She was a source of love and support to everyone she met and had a deep devotion to family and friends. She loved nature and reveled in sitting outside listening to the birds [...]

title: Staci Blanton
description: Staci Blanton went to heaven to be with Jesus on October 25, 2025.She had many difficult years before giving her life to God.Born in Vallejo, April 10, 1973, she went to be with Jesus October 25, 2025.
